name: Graphics Design
desc: Designed end-to-end digital branding for events, including posters, event passes, digital invites, and social media teasers.

name: Video Editing
desc: Editing: Edited high-quality videos using Adobe Premiere Pro, with smooth transitions, color correction, audio mixing, and cinematic effects for enhanced storytelling.

name: 2D Animation
desc: Created engaging 2D animations using Adobe Animate, focusing on character movement, scene transitions, and storytelling for explainer.

name: 3D Animation
desc: Designed and animated 3D characters, objects, and environments using Autodesk Maya and Blender, focusing on realistic movement and camera dynamics.

name: Logo Design
desc: Developed custom logo concepts using Adobe Illustrator, including symbol mark, wordmark, and combination logos tailored to client vision.

name: Motion Graphics
desc: Built motion design assets with keyframe animation, masking, and effects layering in After Effects to deliver smooth and professional visuals.
